DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this protocol is to evaluate the safety of Apixaban in prophylaxis of Venous Thromboembolism (VTE) in Indian patients undergoing elective total knee or hip replacement
DOC.brief_title: Multi-center Study to Evaluate the Safety of Apixaban (BMS-562247) in Indian Subjects Undergoing Elective Total Knee Replacement or Total Hip Replacement Surgery
